website_summaries.verdict: If you need a case to carry your Switch and plenty of accessories, this is your best option.
pros: This EVA shell carrying case is the best choice for carrying your Switch and its accessories, including the dock
The inner compartments make it easy to store and remove your console and accessories
Holds two Joy-Cons and plenty of games
cons: The case holds the console and accessories somewhat loosely, so they may move around if the case is tilted

website_summaries.verdict: A decently priced hard shell carry case with plenty of room for all your gaming essentials. Ideal for keeping your gear protected and organized.
pros: Accommodates a full Nintendo Switch gaming system and accessories, including room for one pro controller
Shock-absorbing EVA shell keeps contents safe from splashes, dust, knocks, and falls
Can be carried by the easy-grip handle or with the detachable shoulder strap
cons: Accessory cutouts aren't quite as snug as we'd like
Adjustable shoulder strap could be longer

customer_reviews.title: you will not find a better deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nintendo Switch storage case becasue my daughter is an avid gamer and he collection of all things switch is growing out of hand! Now, this storage case has allowed me to wrangle all of her odds and ends together in one place so nothing gets lost. It has many little compartments for all the different accessories, and it's made out of quality, durable matieral, which is so important becasue my fifteen year old is really hard on her gaming equipment. For the cost, you will not find a better deal!
customer_reviews.author: Chryssy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son so I can only write the review based on his reaction. My son was happy to receive this gift, he did not have a case that would protect his switch system so he took it out of the house on very rare occasions so he was absolutely delighted to see the sturdiness , lightness and ease for carrying and the size of the case. So based upon his reaction and his verbal assessment of the product after opening is how I was able to give this the much deserved review.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits well except the cords
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for carrying the Switch, dock, controller and games. Everything fits like a glove, and it feels solid. Only complaint is that the little net for carrying the HDMI cable and joy-con straps is pretty useless... it's both too small and too limp, so every time we use the case anything in the net just ends up falling out into the rest of the case. Not a big deal, but worth noting. Otherwise, it does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great to move your Nintendo Switch with everything
customer_reviews.text: I usually move the dock when I'm on the go with my switch and this case really helps me with that amazingly and it's pretty easy to carry on. It can carry a gaming control, two controls with the console, the console, the power supply, the dock, several cables and several game cartridges. It's awesome! By the way, the material looks of great quality and feels sturdy, which is awesome. UPDATE: I now have a couple of months using this case and I thinks it's even better! :). It was a great purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Cabrera Peña

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my daughter's new switch for when she switches back and forth from my and her mother's house. This case isn't small, but it is absolutely perfect for this purpose. It will fit easily: the AC adapter, the switch w/sides attached, the DOCK, a PRO controller and a JOYCON controller.....and plenty of room left for an HDMI cord. It's semi-hard sided with molded slots for everything. I don't plan on dropping it, but if I did, I wouldn't cringe. Nice adjustable shoulder strap as well. Only gripe would be it having two zipper pulls instead of just the one...but if that's my only complaint, then that should say enough. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Hus Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not as superior as other switch cases
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to return this product because the pouch was so small that it actually couldn’t hold anything. Other products seem to use the space on top for more storage giving you more bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it. It looks so sleek and professional on the outside but holds all of what he needs when traveling. He used to carry his switch in a plastic bag but it can get scratched and damaged in there. For his birthday I got him it and he was so happy! I recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hales

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating and disappointing. Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrated with this product. The place for the pro controller is too tight, causing buttons to be pressed all the time, eventually draining the battery. For a trip, this means you get to your destination with a non-operational controller you have to charge first. Also, the switch does not feel like it is properly limited in movement inside the case, putting in question how well it is protected at all. Would not recommend this case to anyone honestly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Yaari

customer_reviews.title: REALLY NICE! One issue.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that you can't see what the games are when they are in the pouch. Everything is top notch and looks good though, so I'm not even sure if I should knock off a star, but I had to because it was just so upsetting. If you plan on using a different case most of hte time and just using this for travel, might work for you anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack, it holds a ton of games the controllers, the system and back up paddles as well. It's pretty durable enough that I feel like if I drop it will all my stuff in it, it would be protected. It's also way nice to be able to store everything in it so it's not scattered around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Switch accessories!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to keep his Nintendo Switch in. It is the best carrying case I have found. It is very sturdy. There is space inside for cords, the console, the switch, controller, and even headphones. It has an adjustable strap for carrying. It is the perfect size for everything needed to carry around. He has taken this with him on overnight trips and he has had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Danielle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday with a switch. The handle broke within 2 minute...and my daughter didn’t do it, I did....by picking it up....empty. Complete rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: The fit of the controllers is too tight and awkward
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time putting the stuff into this case, because it's like whoever designed it only got rough estimates for how big the controllers and such actually are. Some things are way too tight, others are loose and roll around in the case if you tilt it. Not thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Rudis

customer_reviews.title: Very secure fit and durable quality!
customer_reviews.text: This case fits my Switch and accessories really well and securely! I have a pro controller along with the joy cons, and this just fits it all! I don't have that many games, but they all fit well in this case! Definitely worth the buy, especially if you ever plan on traveling with your full Switch (dock and accessories).
customer_reviews.author: Usman Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is great and feels very high quality. It's definitely a bit overpriced though, as you could get a carrying case, charging dock, Switch stand, and more in a bundle for about $5 less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Case Out There
customer_reviews.text: This case works really great, doesn't have a super huge footprint, and can easily store a switch and 3DS with all the games and accessories together. Really the only complaint I have is that they force you to post a review to get the warranty, but that's not an important gripe
customer_reviews.author: FlashFood

customer_reviews.title: Great product really durable goods are you
customer_reviews.text: This product does not belong to me it belongs to my brother but after I used it this weekend I can safely say it is a good product and it is definitely durable when we buy my godson a Nintendo switch he will be getting one of these to protect it when he leaves the house with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted. Sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: My family is moving soon and we needed a durable and sturdy Nintendo Switch case that could hold a good number of games while accommodating all of the console’s accessories. The case is a good size while still being portable and seems to be made of good quality material. It is a low-profile case which also helps avoid identification of the high value content it carries. The strap is a fair size, although not long enough to strap it from your neck and carry across your body, which would have been a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Used it to travel to hotels and being my switch and doc it’s realy great for price feels durable I saw comments saying it breaks on them but idk it seem reliable for me I hope it doesn’t so far it hasn’t. I think they should come out with more colors but honestly it trust this and will use this to carry my switch when traveling
customer_reviews.author: ok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have read reviews on the strap braking on this item and so far after owning it for a few months I can see it might end up coming apart but so far so good. I think if I used it more I would be able to tell. But from the average use I do it has been holding up. Perfect for my Nintendo Switch on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Option
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this case for my boyfriend because he travels alot. It's very useful keeps things organized and safe. It fits everything that comes with the switch. The case itself feels nice and fairly sturdy. They also give you a lifetime warranty with 10 days of purchase. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Nayeli Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product about a week or so, but it's a great carrier for the Switch so far. I'm not sure how it will hold up over time, but it looks and feels sturdy. For the price, I'm very, very happy with my initial impressions of the product. There's plenty of room for the Switch, Dock, Power cord, HDMI cable and some random accessories as well if you want cram them in. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: It holds my Switch and its accessories as listed. ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds my Switch and its accessories as listed. When the unit is opened, all the items are in their respective places without movement. I was worried the main unit and the dock would knock into each other, but i have had it for the last month and have taken the full unit out on multiple occasions and it has not come into contact with one another. Well worth the investment if you're going to utilize the portability of the whole unit, and not just the Switch itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Han

customer_reviews.title: Great durable case for switch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case very much! The case is a hard shell that really protects equipments inside. It feels durable and has a semi hard padded compartment for your other switch essentials. Perfect fit for all the equipment! It is snug enough to keep things from moving bur still leaves just enough space to make items easy to place and remove items. There is also small pockets where you can place all your tapes. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Shereen

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I took a trip out to WA. and wanted to take my baby with me so this is what I went with and I am very satisfied. Carried everything I needed snug as a bug and survived the rigorous task of going through TSA and the baggage handlers. I also take my Switch over to my buddies' houses and this helps to make sure I have everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D.

customer_reviews.title: A spot for everything for the Switch
customer_reviews.text: This case holds everything I need for my Switch, including the power adapter, the dock, the HDMI cable, Joy-cons, the Joy-Con grip, and the wired controller I have for it. I definitely recommend this! Too many cases only seem to be meant for holding just the console in handheld mode and not much else, and I wanted to be able to store the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Danny B

customer_reviews.title: Solid Switch case for all the things
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built pretty solid, good amount of room for all of the Switch basics. I used to throw everything in a cardboard box when taking my Switch to my in-laws or other places. This case is so much nicer, protects all of the pieces, and holds almost everything. The only thing I can’t fit is an extra pro controller or 2. It only fits one.
customer_reviews.author: A & S

customer_reviews.title: It is well-built and the straps and zippers are sturdy. My kids can store the entire switch system ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he absolutely loves it. It is well-built and the straps and zippers are sturdy. My kids can store the entire switch system in it. The bag was bigger than I expected but we needed a case like this for travelling when we are away from home for longer periods of time. Now the kids can bring along the docking station and other accessories safely with them.
customer_reviews.author: Zibby

customer_reviews.title: The best switch case available.
customer_reviews.text: If you need to transport your Switch, games, extra joycons and the charging port then this is the case to get. Other smaller cases are more convenient if you only want to transport the Switch itself, but for a long vacation it is really great to have this case. I brought it with on my recent trip and I had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a slight issue with the first purchase of the case. Contacted Amazon and the product manufacturer immediately contacted me and provided a replacement. The case's sewn in holder for the shoulder strap tore away from the case. I believe that it was only that particular case, because when I recieved the replacement ( in 2 days!) It was excellent. Customer service and responses are great. Recommend for sure and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: nathan falcone

customer_reviews.title: SPACE, SPACE, AND MORE SPACE
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good carrying case, more pros than cons. My only issue with case itself is the net under the cartridge holders, theres no elasticity to the top lining of the net making it weak. My joycon wrist straps are constantly slipping out during travel so whenever I open it, it’s scattered about. Other than that minor detail, I really have no issues. The case is close to perfect and theres enough room to even store the original AC adapter that other cases dont have the spce for. 4.5/5 would buy again. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Charles Carreno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome! Everything fits perfectly inside the case and my son, 11yrs old, loves it. He takes his Nintendo Switch everywhere now and receives compliments on the case. I would repurchase this item and I do recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Great sized case for Switch accessories
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was wanting a case to hold her switch and controllers for travel purposes. She had one that held the console and a few games, but she wanted to pack extra controllers. This case fit the bill! Not only is there room for the console and an extra set of Joy Con controllers. It holds 2 sets of grips the Joy Cons fit into, cords, and more game cartridges than her other one! An added bonus is it's a great way to keep all her accessories organized while at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Case!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this carrying case! I too was looking for something that could fit everything in one single case and that felt sturdy and boy is this it. Although true the little pocket that it has on top isnt that sturdy or tight enough to hold something's, it doesnt bother be much. ADAPT AND OVERCOME. I do move about a lot and carrying ths stuff separately was becoming a hassle and plus, you IMPRESS ANYONE ANYWHERE you go 😉. I dont use the shoulder strap that it comes for it fits in my bookbag perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough but Could Use Some Improvements
customer_reviews.text: This case does its job well but suffers from the following problems: 1. The slots are not as intuitive or as form-fitting as they could be; I'm still not certain that my adapter and HDMI cable are in the intended places and I don't like the way my pro controller fits. 2. The mesh-bag under the game slots pushes down on the dock when anything is in it. I don't know if it will cause damage but it is concerning. On the other hand, the strap, once lengthened out, is very comfortable and the case is pretty efficient.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Carry All In One!
customer_reviews.text: A really great case! Carries everything I have for my switch and keeps it secure. Stuff doesn't shake around inside. The case is semi-hard and will protect against bumps and drops. Also has a nice shoulder strap! Using this is much better than putting my Switch in its original case and transporting everything else in a back pack. I reccomend this!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota L.

customer_reviews.title: Great case, very minimal adjustments needed!
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall! Case is very sturdy, and has enough space to store everything you might have. I would definitely recommend this case for those who are looking for a good traveling case. With all this though, I do have a few issues that I wish were a bit better. 1) As many people have already stated, the pouch to store the HDMI cable and straps is a bit small. I wish the company created a better design. 2) This case is supposed to come with a lifetime warranty, but when you go on the website provided you can’t register. The company’s website is being sold away, good luck trying to get in contact with the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Case
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a pretty well made case. Only drag is that the top portion of the case is not as hard as I was expecting it to be, but as long as I am not flinging the crap out of it when I take it with me it should be okay. Additionally, the mesh inside is not that tense. the HDMI cable can occasionally slip out if you move the case a *little* more rough than normal. But it's all right, not that big of a deal. Cool this is that the case can fit my GameCube control inside, so that's a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Raul D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. It holds about everything you need and protects it well. However, it is snug around the switch itself, so if you have a case on the screen, it needs to be super slim to fit in this carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Storage Case for My Switch
customer_reviews.text: This case fit all of my Switch items perfectly! I wanted a case that would allow me to take the whole setup to friends houses, and this did the job perfectly! I also loved the little details in the seams being red and white, like my other Nintendo Switch "official" smaller case. Overall, a great case. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbey

customer_reviews.title: Useful and durable
customer_reviews.text: Works for me just fine. Has been very durable so far. I don’t store my games in the case or use the carrying strap. When I don’t carry the dock it can hold 2 pro controllers and 2 sets of joycons. I wish the little sleeve on the lid was longer because things keep falling out of there
customer_reviews.author: Ed Seely

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Sturdy Case
customer_reviews.text: I just got the case but so far it fits my needs. We will see how well it holds up but with the extended warranty I'm not worried if something should break on the case. I wish the case could hold the Switch with a grip case on. I hated having to remove my Orzly grip case in order to fit the Switch in this travel case.
customer_reviews.author: SupaDad

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy. Better than Official Nintendo Case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend’s new Switch and he was highly satisfied. Was debating between the official Nintendo Switch Carry case and this one, and this had so much more of what he wanted. Able to carry a controller and much more games. Only downside is that he said the game cartridges are a little difficult to get in the slots. I’m sure with some use they will loosen up. Overall a great purchase and highly satisfied. Plus it’s guaranteed for life.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Eden

customer_reviews.title: Snug as a bug
customer_reviews.text: The thing about giving in to temptation is it will take you farther than you ever wanted to go, it cost you more than you ever intended to pay, Keeps you longer than you ever intended to stay. :~PB
customer_reviews.author: ; ~ PB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel case for switch
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect travel case for my switch. It holds everything securely while traveling. It has ample storage for games and is sturdy so it keeps the electronics from getting damaged at all. LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlene

customer_reviews.title: Why does this have such good reviews??
customer_reviews.text: The cutouts don't even feel like they were even made for the Switch or it's accessories. Only the switch body and dock fit "correctly". Everything else either doesn't fit or kinda just "squeezes in" randomly and haphazardly. Not sure why everyone is giving this such glowing reviews when the competing products are better in almost every way
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Countryman II

customer_reviews.title: Gifted
customer_reviews.text: Well I can't tell you what my son thinks, but when I got it and looked at it I liked it. It was built very Sturdy and the zippers seemed to work without the occasional stoppage that most zippers have. It looks to have plenty of storage and I do believe that my son will use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Casebolt Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Carrying Strap is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today, faster than expected. Feels sturdy and looks really nice. So far we like the quality and LOVE LOVE LOVE the strap for carrying. Was worried that the Nintendo Switch wouldn’t fit with case, but it does. Great product! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great for somebody who wants to take care of their switch. It holds the controllers well. It has plenty of storage space for all of the games. The outside fabric is rugged great for keeping everything inside safe.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: good price and is able to hold just about everything you'd need for your switch
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wasn't sure if I was going to keep this item because I didn't think there was a case that would work. But this thing is great. I was able to fit the entire console plus a pro controller, the plastic piece that allows you to dock the joycons, the power cable, an HDMI cable, the USB c cable to charge the pro controller and it has slots for about 20 games. I highly recommend this case if you need to move the entire console from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Shuster

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have not traveled with this yet but keep it to store all the switch stuff in. Super durable, hard case. Fits everything nicely. Does have a bit of a “chemical” smell to it. Overall nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing full system travel case
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited to fill my new bag up will all the stuff I get for my switch. Most of it feels snug, but there's a section in the middle thats meant for the pro controller and that's cool and all, but I do not plan to buy one. I want to keep getting joycons and the special grip controller for them, but it simply wouldn't give it that snug fit in that spot. Every section is specifically made for one item and I love that because it's a good fit and wouldn't be loose, but this is just a small minor inconvenience. I still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This pack is super secure. This will do well to keep my switch safe. Thank you so much ! They also come with a warranty and a 50% discount on your next order (if you write a review).
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Missing inner storage compartments
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, the case I received is missing both the netted storage compartment for chords and the game storage above it. Thankfully this is a prime item and so I'll be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Annie & Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great case! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! It fits all of our games, several controllers, the Switch itself, and the docking station! I wish it had more storage for cords, but otherwise this is a great purchase! We take our Switch to friends' houses a lot and like to play the Switch on their TVs, so we can take the whole dock with us now. Very convenient to keep it all in one case, and it's durable enough that it will definitely protect everything you have in there as long as you use as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Noodles

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for this case!
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for my day-to-day use. Much sturdier than I thought it would be. I was very much pleasantly surprised. Lots of fun colors, I even bought one for my kid for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: busyfig (Fig 104)

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and his new Nintendo Switch. It is designed well and big enough to carry all the accessories that he has now with this new toy. He is very happy with it and enjoys carrying it around when he takes it places. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: eric wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Good Case to hold Everything
customer_reviews.text: Got this product to carry everything for my switch, and it surely does that in the most compact way possible. Only small criticisms are it is a little hard to get the game chips in and out of their slots, and the HDMI cable is a bit big for the top pouch (even though it fits). Anyway, great case, great materials, nice that it's waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Rei-

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty picky when it comes to carrying cases for... well anything. I looked at a number of different options before settling on this case and am very pleased with the results. The case is durable with a rigid exterior and formed slots to fit the components. The fit is solid without being too tight to risk excess wear and tear. All the seams appear to be well done and the various bits of hardware are appropriate for the task. The closest thing to a complaint is that the net pouch seems a little small to be much use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Klein

customer_reviews.title: Take your Switch anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Fits all the essential Switch components for traveling and keeping the hardware safe. Power cord pocket is not big enough to hold the cord however. Carrying strap is perfect
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for Switch owners!
customer_reviews.text: This case is extremely well made. It looks great, has compartments for each part of the Switch system, tons of room to hold games securely, and the outside material is incredibly durable. This was an amazing purchase. Makes me even more excited about having my Switch!
customer_reviews.author: Holly G.

customer_reviews.title: It holds it all
customer_reviews.text: It holds basically everything you could want to fit inside of it. I was able to fit my switch, dock, pro controller, all the cables for the dock including the brick, wii gamecube adapter, and gamecube controller inside without much fuss at all. Feels solid when things are inside of it and it has a nice amount of padding between the inside and outside to make me think everything would be just fine if I dropped it from any reasonable height. I have not done that to confirm though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: I frequently need to bring my Switch between the two places I live and carrying the dock got easier. Very sturdy, fits things enough. Although, its pocket inside near the cardholders is small and loose. Everything I put in there will be out of place when I open. But what matters is well held, like the switch, the dock and controller.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno S.

customer_reviews.title: Just dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: This Nintendo switch case is very cheaply made, the handle broke and the strap broke today, on it's 1st airport trip. I have owned this for less than 2 weeks. This is one of the worst items I have ever purchases
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Get it if you need it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves and uses it all the time. High quality product. We recommend the product if you need it of course. Thank you the company that makes it and shipped it to us.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great option for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything nice and snug to take your Switch, dock, controller, cords and plenty of game cartridges. Room for maybe one more item, but not much else. The case is rigid, but not RIGID - it holds its shape but offers minimal flex. IE: good for on the go, but maybe not for placing in the back of a moving van. Overall, I'm very happy with its performance, as I bought my Switch specifically to use while away from home!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Van Buren

customer_reviews.title: Solid case, fits switch and all accessories, and the whole thing fits inside a backpack
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a case to hold your switch, dock, games, controllers, and any other accessories (I have a grip case as well for when I play the switch in portable mode) then this is exactly what you are looking for. I have been very happy with this case. Pretty solid construction, fits everything comfortably, and the whole case fits inside of a backpack! I am very happy with it. Only thing to not is that the handle at the top is made of cloth and may be prone to getting damaged if the case becomes really heavy but it has been fine so far since I have used it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Switch Case
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the durability as I just got it but it seems very sturdy and nicely made. It has nice spaces inside for all the Switch parts and accessories. I'm looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: montanacarol

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing case. It holds everything as pictured on amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing case. It holds everything as pictured on amazon, and can optionally hold a pro controller in the slot the joycon connector goes in (attached is that setup). The cables and connectors all fit without being compressed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trivedi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Durable and effective for traveling. Definitely serves its purpose and keeps everything neat and protected. The switch fits in the compartment even with a case on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for a Switch! I've been using it for a couple of months now and it has been used daily to transport my Switch, dock, controller and games. Everything fits nicely and offers great protection.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ryan Wise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory for a gamer.
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son loves having our switch when we travel and this makes sure it doesn't get cracked or broken when packing and traveling. It's also great because it can hold all the game cards with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a big enough case to carry everything Nintendo switch. It's as big as my purse, but very durable and still easy enough for the child to carry his own things.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!! Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! Very sturdy! It holds the consol, screen, 2 sets of remotes and a lot of game carriages. (It protects the most expensive item in our house!) Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great idea for kids- my boys travel back and forth ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea for kids- my boys travel back and forth between my house and their dad’s. This way we can feel better about them taking their switch. It’s a hard case and has plenty of room for switch, games, remotes and even big remotes if you buy those.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, didn't function well
customer_reviews.text: Tldr; it looked like it could work but the cutouts were either too restrictive or didn't fit the parts properly. I returned it. This case looked good in pictures but it really didn't function well. My Switch didn't feel snug in the case, nor did my pro controller line up with the cutouts. Trying to put the AC adapter in felt too squished. In the end, I returned it and bought a messenger bag which fits everything nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Solinis-Heath

customer_reviews.title: Good case to protect your Switch!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this case. It's sturdy and can hold 2 sets of joy-cons (one pair in the switch and one in the shell, the dock, and the power adapter. You can't fit the Switch with any kind of actual case on it. Things are formed into their slots decently snug, but I think I'd prefer a bit more so just for added comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Good case. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case without Nintendo logos all over it. The inner foam could give more room for the pro controllers, but I make it work. Overall a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great case for work travels
customer_reviews.text: I brought this case to transport all of my gaming stiff at once. I love how the sturdiness of the case seems to hold up. Plenty of room for just what i need. I like that even though i don't intend on using it, it comes with a shoulder strap that is detachable. I recommend this case for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal case. Love that it can fit literally everything to set up my entire switch somewhere else and even pack my pro controller. Great for when I go to local smash bro’s tournaments
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Survived Afghanistan
customer_reviews.text: Best carrying case you can buy! Fits everything and then some! Survived a deployment to Afghanistan and kept the gaming system in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Within a day the strap broke and frayed BUT SELLER IS AWESOME and sent a replacement immediately! Great customer service. The case itself is really nice. Even when the strap broke which led to the case falling, my nieces nintendo Switch was safe and wasn’t damaged. Fits EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Dena Micheli-Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Great protective case!
customer_reviews.text: Got this item for my daughter—she loves it! Has plenty of room but holds everything nice and snug. Very protective. Good craftsmanship...well made handle that seems like it will definitely stand up to time.
customer_reviews.author: argonaut511

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure!
customer_reviews.text: This case works perfectly! It holds everything in place, and makes it completely safe to transport around. It also has two different ways of carrying the case, depending on preference. Either use the handle, or the strap over the shoulder. I'm very happy with this purchase, and definitely recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Mum

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable! I tear through things quick so I know. Nice size to carry. Not very bulky. If I accidentally drop it I can almost be certain nothing has happened to it. Only thing I'll say bad about it is I almost wish there was less space. Bouncing around in my vehicle the cables can come loose from their compartments but all in all its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Trent Bryan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CASE
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it was able to include everything that comes out of the box for the Nintendo switch. It keeps everything safe and protected. I gave it to my step-brother as a birthday gift and he loved it, which I was really hoping for! It can hold up to 32 games and that is a lot of games! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very good case. Very durable and the Switch and the dock fit nice and snug so they won't sliding around. If you need a case to take all the Switch components with you this will certainly do the job well. My only complaints are the slot where you can put the joy-con grip is made more for a pro controller and the grip will likely slide around while carrying it. Also wish the carry strap could be a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed.
customer_reviews.text: This carrying case is exactly what I was looking for. I've had it for a few months now and it still looks brand new, which is saying something. I go to and from multiple houses every week and often choose to bring the whole switch console with me. This holds the switch, dock, charger, AC adapter, and anything else you need with your switch. Sometimes I just throw random small things I might need in there too. Its just a great carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Nintendo one and got this one for my nephew. I like this one better because of the game card slots! I wish I had this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mordea

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased; looks really impressive
customer_reviews.text: I get really nervous about "big" purchases like the Switch. I literally will not take it out of the box until I have a sturdy carrying case to hold it. I ordered this case pretty immediately because the reviews and company looked very good, and I can absolutely see why. Can't say much more as of yet, since it's still so new, but I'm hoping!
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case I got for my son! He uses and everywhere he goes! Makes it so convenient instead carrying the device around trying to be careful not to drop it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lapegleg

customer_reviews.title: Great for Long Trips
customer_reviews.text: This case has a hard protective shell which does a great job with not only protecting the console itself but also has enough space for the console dock, all the cables and many games to fit in. Ideal for long trips away from home but would probably recommend a smaller travel version of this to carry around just the console and games for short trips. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Know what you use will be
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. Just wish there was foam in here to keep items from moving too much. Way going to use to take switch on flight. Definitely going to carry on because I don't think it would hold up to the rigors bring tossed around.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Storage caer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling to visit relatives. Also, my husband has Switch tournaments at school, so it’s easy to transport system and hide device until event.
customer_reviews.author: E.McQ.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy case. It arrived in a short time and holds a lot. Perfect for on the go travel or if you just want to organize your switch system at home. I use it to keep everything together and organized so that I don’t have all of my stuff sprawled all over and cluttered. And it’s a pretty nice sized case.
customer_reviews.author: DeVaughn T Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great case for all your Switch items
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this carrying case, using it anytime he’s away overnight or longer. Loves how it fits everything he needs to bring for his switch.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M. Ziemba

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Switch cases for all needs
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely loved this case! I've had to do a lot of travelling and its has been so easy to carry all of my switch games, accessories, and the switch itself with no issues! Worth every penny spent!
customer_reviews.author: Mizuki Yatsurugi

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything you need when you’re on the go.
customer_reviews.text: It holds everything you need: the Switch, the joy cons, the controller attachment for the joycons, your games, the dock, and all the cords. It seems pretty sturdy and feels like it will protect everything. Also, people complain about the shortness of the strap, but it can be adjusted and it reaches all the way down to my hip and I’m 5’9. I’m sure it can go even farther than that.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Clay

customer_reviews.title: Should do the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and like this so far. I did think it was going to be softer inside but other than that, I think it will hold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: NateL

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this gift I got for him. He was carrying everything In a bag. Games controllers, cords and switch. This fits everything perfectly and it’s very sturdy!! Buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Giyler

product_meta.title: iVoler Carrying Storage Case for Nintendo Switch, Portable Travel All Protective Hard Messenger Bag Soft Lining 18 Games for Switch Console Pro Controller & Accessories Black
product_meta.description:
Features:

1. Excellent protection - case is made of sturdy and durable materials


2. Large Storage-A large zippered mesh pocket provides secure storage room for some small Nintendo accessories like charging cable, slim power bank, ear buds, and 2 extra Joy-Cons
3. Roomy and compact - it has one of the largest accessories pocket of any Switch cases but it remains compact and extremely portable.


4. 12 Game Card Slots : Build with 18 game card slots, allowing you to carry and change your favorite games anytime & anywhere.

Satisfaction Guarantee:


If you are not happy with our product for whatever reason, we will send a free replacement or refund your money instantly. We will provide a completely risk free buying experience for you.

How to solve an issue:


If you need help, simply send us a message via "Contact Seller". Your problem will be solved within 48 hours.
feature_bullets: Deluxe Travel Carrying Case. Specially designed to make your whole Nintendo Switch system even more portable & travel friendly. Comfortable handle strap is ideal for carrying. Large storage is suitable to take all the Nintendo Switch accessories when go on a trip.

Multiple Storage. Interior grooves securely hold the Nintendo Switch Console include an extra set of Joy-Cons or a Pro Controller (Please check the 3rd Picture,we show this new solution to hold your Pro Controller ), Nintendo Switch Dock, Joy-Con Charging Grip, AC Adapter. Interior mesh pocket for other smaller Nintendo Switch accessories like extra Joy-Cons, HDMI Cable, Joy-Con Straps etc.Make going on vacation very easy, perfect fit for outdoor activities and enjoy your Nintendo Switch.

Hard Protective Case. Hard EVA shell case protects Nintendo Switch from drops, scratches, bumps, splash and dust. Soft liner protects your Nintendo Switch console from getting scratches. The design of groove make accessories separate so that avoid to scratch each other.
Convenient to Use. Easy to carry with the comfortable handle strap. All-around zipper is easy Opening and Closing. Everything is easy to put in and take out and fits securely.

Scope of Delivery: 1x iVoler Case for Nintendo Switch.The Nintendo Switch console, pro controllers, and other accessories shown in images are for usage demonstration purposes only and are not included with this case.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,758 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
